content.codeBlock: bg-gray-100 dark:bg-gray-800 rounded p-3 my-4 text-sm
content.alertGlobal: rounded my-3 flex items-center justify-between border-l-4 px-4 py-3 shadow-md
content.badgeGlobal: inline px-2 py-1 text-xs rounded border

button.global: text-center font-semibold py-2 px-4 rounded cursor-pointer whitespace-nowrap
button.defaultOutline: bg-transparent hover:bg-indigo-500 text-indigo-500 dark:text-indigo-100 hover:text-white border border-indigo-500
button.primaryOutline: bg-transparent hover:bg-indigo-500 text-indigo-500 dark:text-indigo-100 hover:text-white border border-indigo-500
button.infoOutline: bg-transparent hover:bg-blue-500 text-blue-500 dark:text-blue-100 hover:text-white border border-blue-500
button.warningOutline: bg-transparent hover:bg-yellow-600 text-yellow-500 dark:text-yellow-200 hover:text-white border border-yellow-500
button.errorOutline: bg-transparent hover:bg-red-600 text-red-500 dark:text-red-100 hover:text-white border border-red-500
button.successOutline: bg-transparent hover:bg-green-600 text-green-500 dark:text-green-200 hover:text-white border border-green-500

dialog.window: relative top-10 mx-auto bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 p-6 rounded
dialog.overlay: fixed inset-0 bg-gray-800 bg-opacity-75 overflow-y-auto h-full w-full
dialog.placement: flex items-center min-h-full justify-center p-4 text-center sm:items-center sm:p-0
dialog.header: flex justify-between items-center mb-3 pb-2 border-b border-b-gray-200 dark:border-b-gray-500

table.headerCell: px-3 py-3.5 text-left text-sm font-semibold cursor-pointer
table.cell: whitespace-nowrap px-3 py-4 text-sm text-left text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-50

pager.buttonActive: py-2 px-3 rounded text-sm bg-indigo-500 text-white cursor-pointer

tabNav.wrapper: flex items-center gap-2 my-2 rounded bg-gray-100 border-t-2 border-gray-100 dark:bg-gray-800 dark:border-gray-800
tabNav.selectedItem: border-b-2 border-indigo-500 py-2 px-3 cursor-pointer text-sm
tabNav.item: py-2 px-3 cursor-pointer border-b-2 border-gray-100 text-sm dark:border-gray-800

switch.track: bg-gray-500 relative inline-flex h-6 w-11 flex-shrink-0 cursor-pointer rounded-full border-2 border-transparent transition-colors duration-200 ease-in-out focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-indigo-600 focus:ring-offset-
switch.trackSelected: bg-indigo-500 relative inline-flex h-6 w-11 flex-shrink-0 cursor-pointer rounded-full border-2 border-transparent transition-colors duration-200 ease-in-out focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-indigo-600 focus:ring-offset-
switch.knob: translate-x-0 pointer-events-none inline-block h-5 w-5 transform rounded-full bg-white shadow ring-0 transition duration-200 ease-in-out
switch.knobSelected: translate-x-5 pointer-events-none inline-block h-5 w-5 transform rounded-full bg-white shadow ring-0 transition duration-200 ease-in-out

commandPalette.wrapper: fixed inset-0 flex justify-center items-center bg-black bg-opacity-50 z-50
commandPalette.input: w-full px-4 py-3 mb-4 border-b rounded-b-none rounded-lg focus:outline-none text-gray-800
commandPalette.listItem: flex gap-2 items-center py-2 px-4 hover:bg-gray-100 cursor-pointer text-gray-800
commandPalette.listItemActive: flex gap-2 items-center py-2 px-4 bg-gray-100 cursor-pointer text-gray-800
